desc: Flooring and wall tile store serving Kitchener, Waterloo, Guelph, Cambridge, Ontario. Featuring carpet, hardwood flooring, engineered floors, laminate, tile flooring, wall tile, area rugs and installation. Kitchener's best full service installation specialist. We sell and install any type of flooring or wall tile.

layout.text: Local and Family Owned - Selling all types of flooring, wall tile, or installation services in Kitchener and the surrounding area for 30 years!
Our flooring experts look forward to helping with your project.
